metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Python is a programming language widely used by Data Scientists.
content.html: Python is a programming language widely used by Data Scientists.

content.text: Python has in-built mathematical libraries and functions, making it easier to calculate mathematical problems and to perform data analysis.
content.html: Python has in-built mathematical libraries and functions, making it easier to calculate mathematical problems and to perform data analysis.

content.text: We will provide practical examples using Python.

content.text: To learn more about Python, please visit our Python Tutorial .

content.text: Python has libraries with large collections of mathematical functions and analytical tools.
content.html: Python has libraries with large collections of mathematical functions and analytical tools.
